summary.description:
an evidence-based system for workplace MSD risk management.

Free online OHS risk management toolkit for OHS professionals.

The APHIRM Toolkit was developed by a team of La Trobe University researchers in the Centre for Ergonomics and Human Factors. The toolkit is a set of OHS risk management procedures that target both physical and psychosocial hazards.

... A Participative Hazard Identification and Risk Management toolkit for improving the risk management of musculoskeletal disorders.

summary.name: APHIRM toolkit
